name: Escape from Shoto Tower
description:
Welcome to Shoto Tower! You play the role of Kit, a young girl in post-apocalyptic Japan. With the help of your remote controlled robot OR-30, your mission is to find the secret code that will raise the city's dome shield and protect its citizens from the evil beyond.

Credits: 

Haakon Davidsen - Davidsen-92@hotmail.com - Norway
John Hatfield - john.hatfield.3d@gmail.com - USA
Amy Komili - amyosman15@gmail.com - Canada
Oliver Osman - olitheone@gmail.com - Spain
August Wasilowski - august@mempo.xyz - USA

Controls:

WSAD - Movement
Q and E - Rotate Camera
F - Interact (Both Kit and Robot)
Spacebar - EMP Shockwave and Computer Hacking (Robot Only)
Escape: Pause Menu
